en.line: '...Look, you can try to gloss over it. You can\nkeep silent. But please don't lie. I don't want\nto be lied to by someone I like.'
en.name: Aoi

jp.line: 「……ごまかすのはいい。黙るのも。\n　でも、嘘はつかないでくれ。\n　好きな子に、そんなことされたくない」
jp.name: 碧

en.line: When I say this Ageha falls completely silent.

jp.line: そう言うと、あげはは完全に押し黙った。

en.line: 'So, what happened?'
en.name: Aoi

jp.line: 「で、何があったんだ？」
jp.name: 碧

en.line: 'Back when I had to change schools, when the\nsecret base was destroyed... it was then, right?'
en.name: Aoi

jp.line: 「俺が転校して、秘密基地が壊されて……その時だよな」
jp.name: 碧

en.line: 'It's something that you can't tell me?'
en.name: Aoi

jp.line: 「俺に言えないことか？」
jp.name: 碧

en.line: Ageha still doesn't say anything.

jp.line: やはり、あげはの返事はない。

en.line: 'Why have you kept it from me until now?'
en.name: Aoi

jp.line: 「何で、今まで隠してたんだよ？」
jp.name: 碧

en.line: 'Why is it something that you can't tell me? Is\nit something that you think would hurt me,\nsomething like that?'
en.name: Aoi

jp.line: 「俺に言えない、どんな理由があるんだ？\n　言ったら俺が傷つくとか、そういうことか？」
jp.name: 碧

en.line: 'It's not that... Nothing like that...'
en.name: Ageha

jp.line: 「そういうのじゃ……ないよ……」
jp.name: あげは

en.line: 'Then why can't you tell me?'
en.name: Aoi

jp.line: 「じゃあ、どういうことだよ？」
jp.name: 碧

en.line: 'If you don't tell me I'll find out on my own.'
en.name: Aoi

jp.line: 「教えてくれないなら、自分で調べるぞ」
jp.name: 碧

en.line: 'Who did you hear this from? Ma-kun? Hotaru?'
en.name: Ageha

jp.line: 「誰に、そのこと聞いたの？　マー坊？　ほたる？」
jp.name: あげは

en.line: 'What difference does it make?!'
en.name: Aoi

jp.line: 「関係ないだろ、そんなこと！」
jp.name: 碧

en.line: 'It makes a huge difference!'
en.name: Ageha

jp.line: 「関係あるよ！」
jp.name: あげは

en.line: 'Don't change the topic.'
en.name: Aoi

jp.line: 「話そらすなよ」
jp.name: 碧

en.line: '...You're hiding a whole lot from me, aren't\nyou?'
en.name: Aoi

jp.line: 「……お前さ、色々、隠し事してるよな？」
jp.name: 碧

en.line: 'You told me the other day that they're things\nbest not to know. But that doesn't sit well with\nme.'
en.name: Aoi

jp.line: 「知らない方がいいことあるって、前に言ってたけど、\n　こんなんじゃ、俺、不安だよ」
jp.name: 碧

en.line: 'Well anyways, at the moment I'm getting a little\nhot headed. I won't delve any deeper than\nthis...'
en.name: Aoi

jp.line: 「とりあえず、今は俺も、頭に血のぼってるんで、\n　これ以上詮索しないけど……」
jp.name: 碧

en.line: To regain my cool at a moment like this is a\nremnant of my racing days.

jp.line: この辺の冷静さは、自転車競技で鍛えられた賜物だ。

en.line: 'The next time I see you we're going to talk face\nto face and you're going to tell me, okay?'
en.name: Aoi

jp.line: 「今度、直接顔合わせて、じっくり聞かせてもらうからな」
jp.name: 碧

en.line: With that I end the call.

jp.line: それで、通話を終わらせた。

en.line: I thought Ageha would say something but in the\nend she stayed silent.

jp.line: あげはが何か言うかと思ったけど、最後まで沈黙していた。

en.line: This makes me even more irritated than before. So\nI called her with my cell phone again.

jp.line: そのせいで、ケータイを手に、電話する前よりムカムカしてきた。

en.line: Then I immediately make another call.

jp.line: だから、すぐ、また通話した。

en.line: 'Hey, Hotaru? What we talked about before,\nactually it's OK.'
en.name: Aoi

jp.line: 「あ、ほたるか？　さっきの話、やっぱ、ＯＫってことで」
jp.name: 碧

en.line: 'I'll take you out on a date. Just the two of us.\nLet's go out somewhere.'
en.name: Aoi

jp.line: 「デートしよう。２人っきりで、お出かけだ」
jp.name: 碧
